channel.title: Help with delta
channel.description:
Hello mopars.
I am using a delta base and i have a slight problem. when i log out it doesnt process quick enough and doesnt actually log the player out for atleast 5 - 10 seconds after i log. how can i fix this?
thanks, Haydn.

item.title: Help with delta
item.dc:creator: @reventix reventix
item.description:
@reventix wrote:

[code] public void logout() {
if (validClient(duel_with) && duelFight) {
getClient(duel_with).DuelVictory();
} else {
declineDuel();
}
server.panel.removeListModelItem(playerName);
server.controlPanel.removeListModelItem(playerName);
killMyNPCs();
if(inPitsGame){
inPitsGame = false;
PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!");
}
if(cWarsGame() && PlayerHandler.playersInAlpha == 1){
inClanWars = false;
PlayerHandler.playersInAlpha -= 1;
println_debug(playerName + " reset Clan Wars");
}
if(cWarsGame() && PlayerHandler.playersInBeta == 1){
inClanWars = false;
PlayerHandler.playersInBeta -= 1;
println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!");
}
resetfollowers();
savegame(true);
outStream.createFrame(109);

	//logoutButton = true;
}[/code]

Thats my logout method

Read full topic
